notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, V.D., M.N., D.K.; Methodology, V.D., M.N., R.J.G., E.S.; Software, M.N.; Validation, V.D., D.K. and M.N.; Formal Analysis, M.N.; Investigation, V.D., M.N., R.J.G., E.S., D.K., B.S., E.V.; Data Curation, M.N. and V.D.; Writing—Original Draft Preparation, M.N. and V.D.; Writing—Review and Editing, V.D., D.K., D.B., F.B.; Visualization, M.N.; Supervision, V.D.; Funding Acquisition, V.D. and R.J.G. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
